channel.title: Skola
channel.generator: Webpage HTML Export plugin for Obsidian

item.title: general notes
item.description:
Configure SVI (VLAN)
interface vlan <vlan number> ip address <ip address> <mask> no shutdown exit
Configure default gateway (L2 only)
ip default-gateway <ip address>
Configure interface speed
speed <speed>

Configure SSH
domain-name <ip domain name> crypto key generate rsa How many bits in the modulus [512]: 1024 username <username> privilege 15 secret <password> ip ssh version 2 line vty 0 15 login local transport input ssh exit

Configure hostname
hostname <hostname>
Enable secret password
enable secret <password>
Configure a console password
line console 0 password <password> login exit
Configure remote access to VTY lines
line vty 0 4 password <password> login exit
Configure a Banner MOTD message
banner motd #<message>#
Encrypt all clear-text passwords
service password-encryption
Basic interface configuration
interface <interface> ip address <ip address> <mask> description <description>
Create a loopback
interface loopback <loopback number>

Assign VLAN to a switch interface:
int <interface> switchport mode access switchport access vlan <vlan number> no shut
Config Trunk on a switch interface:
int <interface> switchport mode trunk switchport trunk native vlan <vlan number> no shut
Add Subinterfaces (other side of a trunk) on a router:
int <interface>.<vlan number> encapsulation dot1Q <vlan number> ip address <ip address> <mask>
Config a Trunk on a routing L3 switch
int <interface> switchport mode trunk switchport trunk native vlan 99 switchport trunk encapsulation dot1q #for each vlan: vlan <vlan number> int vlan <vlan number> ip address <gateway ip address> <mask>
Always remember to enable ports!
int <interface> no shutdown

Make ports one EtherChannel
int range <interface range> channel-group <channel group number> mode ?
Configuring EtherChannels
int Po<number>

active Enable LACP unconditionally auto Enable PAgP only if a PAgP device is detected desirable Enable PAgP unconditionally on Enable Etherchannel only passive Enable LACP only if a LACP device is detected

Exclude addresses on a DHCP server
ip dhcp excluded-address <first ip from range> <last ip from range>
Create a DHCP pool
ip dhcp pool <pool name> network <net id> <mask> default-router <gateway> dns-server <dns server ip> domain-name <domain>
Configure a router as a DHCP relay agent
int <inwards facing interface> ip helper-address <DHCP server ip>
Configure a DHCP server as a client
int <interface> ip address dhcp no shutdown

SLAAC
ipv6 unicast-routing interface <interface> ipv6 address <ipv6 address>/<prefix> no ipv6 nd ra suppress no shutdown
Stateless
interface <interface> ipv6 nd other-config-flag ipv6 dhcp server <pool name> exit ipv6 dhcp pool <pool name> dns-server <dns ipv6 address> domain-name <domain>
Stateless DHCPv6
interface <interface> ipv6 nd other-config-flag
Stateful DHCPv6
interface <interface> ipv6 nd managed-config-flag


IPv4
ip route <ip address> <mask> <outwards interface> <next hop port ip address>
IPv6
ipv6 route <ip address>/<prefix> <outwards interface> <next hop port ip address>

IPv4
router ospf 10 router-id <id> network <net id> <wildcard> area 0
IPv6
ipv6 router ospf <process id> router-id <router id> exit int <interface> no switchport ipv6 ospf <process id> area <area id>
